data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home 64-bit, version 1709, build 16299.309, Google IME and Microsoft IME
data.client_settings: Desktop Canary Build 13096 and Desktop Stable Build 13009
data.expected_result: If I type ストレンジャー it should appear as in this image
data.short_description: "Find or start a conversation" only registers single input characters from Japanese IME and Chinese IME
data.steps_to_repro: - Click "Find or start a conversation" in the "Direct Messages" menu - Try to type any kana but あ、い、う、え、お、ア、イ、ウ、エ、オ
